lyrics.stanza: Now is come salvation and strength And the kingdom of our God And the authority of His Christ: For the accuser of our brethren is cast down Which accused them before our God day and night.
And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, And by the word of their testimony And they loved not their soul lives unto death. Therefore rejoice, rejoice, rejoice!
